name: myERP.com
tag_list: erp, crm, sales, inventory, purchasing, accounting
description: Manage your business in the cloud
overview:
myERP is the #1 Cloud ERP - trusted by over 20,000 small businesses from more than 100 countries. Try myERP now. It’s Fast, Easy and Free!

myERP is designed specifically for small business owners who want to spend more time growing their business and less time managing it. There is no costly software to buy or install, or complicated user manuals to study.

myERP is so simple that it takes less than 5-minutes to set up and use, driven by an intuitive graphical user interface.

myERP is FREE, for up to 2 users. After that, it’s only $29/month per additional user.

Our an All-in-One solution integrates together all the key business functions needed to manage your small business in the Cloud, including:

  • Accounting,
  • CRM
  • Inventory Management
  • Sales
  • Purchasing
  • and its Totally integrated with Google Apps

Simplify your life with myERP!
